page.title: 16EDWARDS AND JONES LTD.
page.content: Edwards and Jones is a company which makes filters,pumps,pugmills and presses for Water Treatment and Sewage Works and Pottery Factories .They also have been known to have manufactured for Waste Disposal Units.There are 70 people working in the factory at Meir Park but in the company around the city there are about 150.They export all over the world to such places as Belgium,South Africa,America,Canada, Australia,France and Hong Kong.We know that they have been making machinery for the last 100 years.The company moved onto Meir Park about 5 years ago when the Industrial Site was extended.
